name: Read Text Aloud
description: Pronunciation, stress, intonation, rhythm, and clarity of speech.

name: Listening and Repeat Sentence
description: Listening accuracy, short-term memory, pronunciation, and fluency.

name: Describe Picture / Image
description: Describing visual information, using appropriate vocabulary, organizing ideas, and speaking fluently.

name: Re-tell Lecture / Speak About Lecture
description: Summarizing key points, identifying main ideas and details, paraphrasing, and organizing spoken information clearly.

name: Answer / Respond to Questions
description: Understanding questions, giving relevant responses, accuracy, and natural fluency.

name: Respond to Conversations / Short Dialogues
description: Listening comprehension, appropriate reactions, functional language, and pragmatic communication.

name: Express Opinion / Discussion / Speak About a Topic
description: Expressing opinions, explaining ideas, giving examples, comparing viewpoints, and supporting arguments.

name: Virtual Interview / Personal Questions
description: Personal fluency, basic narrative skills, grammar and vocabulary control, and natural interaction.

name: Discuss Advantages & Disadvantages
description: Comparing and contrasting ideas, structuring arguments, using linking language, and balanced reasoning.

name: Respond to a Statement / Agree-Disagree
description: Expressing agreement or disagreement, justifying opinions, evaluating ideas, and logical reasoning.

name: Create a Short Story / Narrative Based on Prompt
description: Narrative structure, creativity, sequencing events, descriptive language, and fluency.

name: Collaborative Task / Interactive Task / Long Turn
description: Interactive communication, turn-taking, negotiating meaning, coherence, and sustained speech.

name: Describe and Discuss a Chart / Diagram / Process
description: Describing data or processes, explaining trends or steps, making comparisons, and presenting information logically.
